text:
Funny listening to Blaire mention #hydroxycholoroquine.

 I remember #Canada trialed #Chloroquine for #covid19Canada-despite expert caution-and failed in spectacular fashion.

Litigation begins in 🇺🇸

#Quinoline #neurotoxicity 
#MefloquineMassTort
